title: Klassisch IV Watch Face
summary: Klassisch IV Watch FaceThe original and only one from Opulence.
developerAddress: 2036 avenue  de la salle, Montreal, Quebec, Canada, H1V 2K5
description: You need Watchmaker 3.3.x app to use this Watch Face download it here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfYInstall and it will import automatically in Watchmaker after opening. For Android Wear 5Many tried to copy it!but their is only one opulence.This design is dedicated to them.Here it is the new klassisch IV.a gift from opulence!get a free copy!Based on the design of the already successful klasisch watch face.package in a unlock apk file .beautiful pixel perfect design with glossy aluminum and glass effect hands that let you see trough  conceived for optimal placement and visibility of the elements to fit on the moto 360 display. will fit on all round displays and square.The file is unlock and the dimmed mode was build white and tinted in watchmaker, so you can customize it by opening a copy in watchmaker adjusting the tint on the six first layers with a name starting by ''Dim''
descriptionHTML:
You need Watchmaker 3.3.x app to use this Watch Face download it here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY
Install and it will import automatically in Watchmaker after opening. For Android Wear 5

Many tried to copy it!
but their is only one opulence.This design is dedicated to them.
Here it is the new klassisch IV.a gift from opulence!
get a free copy!
Based on the design of the already successful klasisch watch face.
package in a unlock apk file .

beautiful pixel perfect design with glossy aluminum and glass effect hands that let you see trough
conceived for optimal placement and visibility of the elements to fit on the moto 360 display. will fit on all round displays and square.

The file is unlock and the dimmed mode was build white and tinted in watchmaker, so you can customize it by opening a copy in watchmaker adjusting the tint on the six first layers with a name starting by ''Dim''
comments: Awesome! How do you go into night mode? (green neon numbers). I've only seen it change when setting my watch on the charger. I don't know of there's a setting or something I'm missing..

It's a great app, but... Every few hours, the screen goes blank and I have to restart the watch for it to show the face. I've tried resending it from the phone app, but it is still a black screen until restart. Also sometimes it changes to a plan Moto watch face and I have to change it back. Also, when it goes to dim, part of the hands and middle aren't visible. How can I resolve all of the above?
Wrong date Nice face but date is wrong; today is Sept 18th and it shows 1 18.
Amazing A great piece of art and a watch face maker that does it right with great ambient faces as well- thank you
Does not work. Does not show up in my watch faces. Shame it looked good.
MIA Does not show up in my watch list so I can't use it had to uninstall
